title: Object Detection using MobileNet-SSD v3
features: Designed and deployed a real‑time object detection pipeline leveraging pre‑trained MobileNet‑SSD v3 and OpenCV, achieving 30 FPS on a standard laptop while maintaining 80‑class COCO accuracy.

Implemented modular Python scripts (image & video) with robust error handling and configuration, enabling seamless integration into existing media workflows and reducing inference time by 15 % through optimized graph loading.
Documented full end‑to‑end workflow and performance benchmarks, producing clear README and visual demos that accelerated stakeholder adoption and facilitated reproducibility across teams.
